mapper.sql: ID, CASE_ID, JUDGE_ID, JUDGE_NAME, CLERK_ID, CLERK_NAME, COURT_ID, COURT_ROOM_ID, COURT_ROOM_NAME, PLAN_START_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, START_TIME, REST_TIME, END_TIME, ARCH_TIME, TRAIL_STATUS, ACCESS_URL, PUB_ACCESS_URL, VOD_ACCESS_URL, ALLOW_LIVE_FLAG, COURT_REC, BURST_STATUS, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME, ROOT_ORG_ID, ORG_ID, OPT_LOCK, COLLEGIAL_ID, TRIAL_LEVEL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from COURT_CASE_PLAN
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT c.case_num,c.case_name,c.court_id,c.case_type_name, c.CASE_DESC,c.ACCUSER,c.ACCUSER_LAWER,c.ACCUSED,c.ACCUSED_LAWER ,c.REGISTER_TIME,c.PARTY, p.* FROM COURT_CASE_PLAN p left join COURT_CASE c on c.id=p.CASE_ID
p.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.DEL_FLAG=0
and p.ID= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by p.UPDATE_TIME DESC
